text: To Live and Die in L.A. is a 1985 American neo-noir action thriller movie set in Los Angeles and was directed by William Friedkin. It stars William Petersen, Willem Dafoe, John Pankow and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:1985 action movies Category:1985 crime movies Category:1985 thriller movies Category:1980s crime thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by William Friedkin Category:American independent movies
title: To Live and Die in L.A.
